list.name: Changes
list.comment:
feat: Implement dark mode toggle (main)
Implements a dark mode toggle using CSS variables and JavaScript. The toggle switches between light and dark themes, updating the styles of the body, inputs, and buttons. Styled-components is used to manage global styles and apply the theme dynamically. The dark mode toggle button is now at the top right corner.

task.summary:
feat: Add initial project setup (main)
Initial project setup including IDE settings, gitignore, and minor code cleanup. Removed unnecessary variable assignments and intermediate steps in `text-converter.js`, `functions.js`, and updated a label reference in `index.html`.

feat: Implement dark mode toggle (main)
Implements a dark mode toggle using CSS variables and JavaScript. The toggle switches between light and dark themes, updating the styles of the body, inputs, and buttons. Styled-components is used to manage global styles and apply the theme dynamically. The dark mode toggle button is now in the top right corner.
